sentences.en: " Fairyland ", however inadequate , is perhaps the only word to choose.
sentences.cn: 说它宛若 “ 神话世界 ”, 恐怕也只是见重于外在的美吧.

sentences.en: At night, the harbor is a fairyland.
Coal piles on the Zinc mine is like an fairyland for children.
sentences.cn: 炼锌矿上的煤堆是孩子们的乐园.

sentences.en: Enjoyable fairyland, poetic sentiment bonsai, Chinese scenery name card, world geology park.
sentences.cn: 写意仙境, 诗意盆景, 中国山水名片, 世界地质公园.

sentences.en: Fog, Shuitianyise, Huguang nothing seems to Penglai fairyland, are desirable.
sentences.cn: 雾日, 水天一色, 湖光高阁,似蓬莱仙境, 无不令人向往.

sentences.en: I shall cross the seven seas and the thirteen rivers of fairyland.
sentences.cn: 我将要穿越仙境里的七海和十三河.

sentences.en: I shall cross the seven seas and thirteen rivers in the fairyland.
sentences.cn: 我将越过仙人世界里的七个大海和十三条河道.

sentences.en: I should sail the seven seas and the thirteen rivers of fairyland.
sentences.cn: 我要将它航行到仙境里的七海和十三河.

sentences.en: Let us come into this wonderful fairyland with Alice!
sentences.cn: 就让我们和爱丽丝一起走进这奇妙的仙境吧!

sentences.en: Sara then sat on Peter's knee and talked happily about her fairyland.
sentences.cn: 莎拉坐在彼得的膝上,高兴地谈论着她的仙境故乡.

sentences.en: The fairyland has got the Holy Land of nature.
sentences.cn: 神奇的仙境已成了自然的圣地.

sentences.en: The garden was a fairyland of beautiful flowers and sweet odors.
sentences.cn: 那座花园是个繁花似锦、香气袭人的仙境.

sentences.en: The toyshop is a fairyland for young children.
sentences.cn: 玩具店是孩子们的仙境。

sentences.en: This is Tianmu Lake also known as the Green Fairyland.
sentences.cn: 韩佳:这里就是有着绿色仙境之称的天目湖.

sentences.en: We found ourselves in the midst of a veritable fairyland.
sentences.cn: 我们发现我们在名副其实的仙境中.

trans.tran_cn: 仙乡， 仙界，美妙神奇的地方， 仙境
trans.tran_en: a place that looks very beautiful and special
